mapper.select: SELECT id, project_id, stage_id, status, completed_at, created_at, updated_at FROM project_stage WHERE project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY stage_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_stage (project_id, stage_id, status, completed_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{stageId}, COALESCE(#{status}, 'NOT_STARTED'), #{completedAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
